documentation.text:
@notice Controller for all vaults.
 Controller maintains the list of vaults, manages vaults' shared
 properties, e.g. governance and treasury address, and performs
 reward allocation to vaults.

@dev Updates the rewards token.
 Only governance can set a new reward token.

@dev Updates the treasury address.
 Only governance can set a new treasury address.

@notice Controller for all vaults.
 Controller maintains the list of vaults, manages vaults' shared
 properties, e.g. governance and treasury address, and performs
 reward allocation to vaults.

@dev Updates the rewards token.
 Only governance can set a new reward token.

@dev Updates the treasury address.
 Only governance can set a new treasury address.

addRewards(uint256,uint256).details: Add new rewards to a rewarded vault.

params._rewardAmount: Amount of the reward token to add.
params._vaultId: ID of the vault to have reward.

addVault(address).details: Add a new vault to the controller. Note that there is no duplicate check here, which means one vault might be represented by multiple vault IDs.

returns._0: ID of the newly added vault.

initialize(address,address).details: Initializes the Controller contract. Can be invoked only once.

params._rewardToken: Additional reward token (i.e. ACoconut) to the vault users.
params._treasury: ACoconut treasury that holds fees collected from vaults.

setGovernance(address).details: Updates the govenance address. Only governance can set a new governance. The governance can be renounced by setting a zero address.

setRewardToken(address).details: Updates the rewards token. Only governance can set a new reward token.

setTreasury(address).details: Updates the treasury address. Only governance can set a new treasury address.

governance.details: Returns the governance address of the Controller. Governance has the greatest right and should be assumed by a Timelock. Controller, all vaults and all strategies share the same governance.

numVaults.details: Returns the total number of vaults managed by the Controller.

rewardToken.details: Returns the token served as additional rewards(i.e ACoconut) to vault users.

treasury.details: Returns the treasury address for vault fees.

vaults.details: Returns the vault address given the vault ID.

userdoc.notice: Controller for all vaults. Controller maintains the list of vaults, manages vaults' shared properties, e.g. governance and treasury address, and performs reward allocation to vaults.
